loans.name: Oscar

texts.es:
Oscar es una persona que es reconocida entre sus familiares y vecinos por ser muy trabajador y siempre querer brindarles una buena calidad de vida a su esposa y sus 2 hijos. Oscar ha tenido grandes dificultades para poder acceder a un empleo, debido a que son muy pocas oportunidades las que se presentan. 
Oscar se dedica a la venta de ropa y sombreros en los municipios cercanos a su residencia, y gracias a esto genera los ingresos para el sostenimiento de su hogar.

Últimamente Oscar ha tenido muy buenos pedidos de sus clientes, pero no cuenta con un inventario de mercancía que pueda responder a estos pedidos. Es por esto que Oscar espera que un préstamo le permita acceder a la compra de mercancía como sombreros y ropa que le permitan atender los pedidos que le han hecho sus clientes.

Oscar espera que sus ventas sigan incrementándose para poderles brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su esposa y sus 2 hijos. Además, sueña con poder establecerse en un lugar fijo con su familia, donde no tenga que viajar tanto y pueda compartir más con ellos.
texts.en:
Oscar is known to his relatives and neighbors as a very hard worker and always wants to provide his wife and 2 children with a good quality life. Oscar has had much difficulty in finding a job, as there are very few opportunities that present themselves.

Oscar works in retail, selling clothing and hats in the municipalities close to his residence and thanks to this, he earns the income necessary to sustain his household.

Lately, Oscar has had many orders from his clients, but he doesn’t have the inventory to fill those orders. That’s why Oscar hopes a loan will permit his to buy merchandise, like clothing and hats, to attend to the demands of his clients.

Oscar hopes his sales continue growing so he can provide his wife and children with a better quality of life. Also, he dreams of being able to establish himself in a fixed place with his family, where he won’t have to travel so much and he can spend more time with his family.

loans.use: buy merchandise like clothing and hats, so he can fill his clients' orders.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise for her store and to repair her refrigerator.

loans.name: Mauricio

texts.es:
Mauricio es una persona que ha sufrido diferentes adversidades en su vida, pero gracias a que es una persona muy trabajadora y emprendedora ha podido salir adelante. Desde hace un tiempo abandonó su ciudad natal y se desplazó en búsqueda de oportunidades de empleo, sin embargo, al no encontrar oportunidades de empleo, decidió montar su propio negocio con el ánimo de poder generar los ingresos para su hogar. Mauricio con 51 años de edad, se encuentra casado y es padre de 1 hijo al cual le quiere brindar todo lo que necesita.

Mauricio ha venido trabajando en su negocio desde entonces, y ha podido crecerlo y posicionarlo en su sector. Gracias a esto tiene muy buena clientela y sus ventas han aumentado considerablemente. Ahora, Mauricio ha tenido que incurrir en diferentes gastos debido a que su hijo ingresa al estudio en estos meses, además ha sufrido algunos inconvenientes que le han hecho gastar mucho dinero. Con el ánimo de aprovechar el inicio de la temporada escolar, Mauricio quiere comprar artículos de papelería que le permitan tener un buen surtido para sus clientes, pero como no cuenta con el capital suficiente para realizar estas compras, Mauricio aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de productos de papelería como cuadernos, lapiceros, borradores, cartulinas, entre otros, y poder así ofrecerles una buena variedad de mercancía a sus clientes.

Mauricio espera aprovechar esta temporada y lograr que sus ingresos aumenten considerablemente. Además, poderles brindar a su hijo y su esposa una mejor calidad de vida.
Mauricio tiene el sueño de poderse comprar su casa propia, y tener su propio local donde montar su negocio.
texts.en:
Mauricio is a person who has suffered various adversities in his life but thanks to his being a very hardworking and enterprising person he’s been able to overcome them.  Some time ago he left the city of his birth and moved in order to seek out employment opportunities.  However, not finding any employment opportunities he decided to open his own business hoping to generate income for his home.  Mauricio, 51, is married and the father of a son for whom he wants to provide everything he needs.

Mauricio has been working in his business ever since and has managed to make it grow and position it in its sector.  Thanks to this he has a good clientele and sales have increased considerably.  Now, Mauricio has had to take on various expenses because his son is starting school around now and he has also had some inconveniences that have cause him to spend much money. 

Hoping to take advantage of the start of the new school term, Mauricio is hoping for a loan that will allow him to purchase stationery supplies like notebooks, pencils, erasers and construction paper, among others to offer a good variety of merchandise to his customers.  Mauricio hopes to take advantage of this season and manage to increase income considerably as well as to be able to offer his wife and son a better quality of life.  Mauricio’s dream is to be able to buy a house of his own and to have his own locale in which to install his business.

loans.use: to buy notebooks, pencils, erasers, construction paper, etc.

loans.name: Duo Salem Group

texts.es:
Dúo Salem.
Este  dúo está formado por don Gerardo.de 36 años de edad, casado tiene 2 hijos el,  nos cuenta que se dedica  pintar y enderezar carros desde hace 10 años, el solicita este crédito porque el trabajo que el tiene se necesita la compra de muchos materiales entonces quiere comprar (pintura, guaipe, material acrílico, etc.) para tener listo para los carros, también esta don Hilario, soltero, nos cuenta que es mecánico desde hace 10 años y es dueño de un taller de mecánica y enderezado y pintura en su casa desde hace 4 años, el solicita este crédito  porque necesita comprar herramientas y materiales para su trabajo porque hay personas que llegan a dejar sus carros, y no le dejan nada de anticipo entonces él tiene que comprar todo lo necesarios si son repuestos para el carro, o pintura para enderezarlos, y en otros cosos  la gente le cancela hasta cuando ya está terminado el trabajo y es cuando él a veces no tiene lo necesario y se atrasa al sacar los trabajos por el dinero que hay que invertirles entonces necesita almacenar (empaques, silicones, guape, herramientas, pintura etc.) además nos cuenta que quiere comprar una pistola para pintar los carros, confía que fape pueda brindarle el apoyo que necesita.ya que el es el lider del duo.
texts.en:
The name of this group is "Dúo Salem" This duo is made up of Gerardo and Hilario. Gerardo is 36, married, and has two children. He tells us he has done paint and body work for ten years. He is applying for this loan because the work he has requires the purchase of a lot of materials, so he wants to buy paint, wiping cloths, acrylic etc., to have ready for the cars.

There is also Hilario. He tells us that he has been a mechanic for ten years and has been the owner of a home-based auto body and repair shop for four years. He is applying for this loan because he needs to buy tools and materials for his work. 

This is because there are people who come to leave their cars, and don't give him any advance notice, so he has to buy everything he needs, whether replacement car parts, or paint for doing body work. 

In other cases, people don't pay him until the work is done; and this is when sometimes he doesn't have what he needs, so he's late finishing the jobs, because of the money that he has to invest in them. So he needs to stockpile gaskets, silicones, wiping cloths, tools, paint etc. Also, he tells us that he wants to buy a spray gun for painting cars. 

He is confident that FAPE can offer him the support he needs, as he is the leader of the duo.

loans.use: To buy materials for repairing cars.

loans.name: Lkhasuren

texts.en:
Mr. Lkhasuren, 37, is a driver for a private company. He has been working as a driver for five years and he is a skillful driver, his co-workers say. 

Lkhasuren lives with his family in a "ger", a Mongolian traditional nomadic tent in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. Lately his "ger" cover is becoming old and is too thin in freezing cold winter weather. Therefore he needs to exchange it for new one. A "ger" cover is a core part of a Mongolian yurt and is made from sheep wool. The loan he is requesting will be dedicated to covering the cost of new "ger" covering to improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: To cover the cost of new "ger" covering.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is 31 years old. She is a mother of one child. She sells men's suits to earn a living. She has been in the business for five years and describes her business environment as favorable because there is limited competition. 

Since she joined Faulu Kenya, Grace has been able to save her income and hopes to be financially stable in the future. She has applied for 25,000 Kenya Shillings to buy men's suits to sell.

loans.use: To buy men's suits to sell.

loans.name: Merlyna

texts.en:
Merlyna is 49 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is separated with two children. 

Merlyna has a shop that sells clothing & beauty products from NATASHA & AVON. She has had this business for  years. She requested a loan for 8,000 PHP to buy stock from AVON & NATASHA to sell.

Merlyna has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Merlyna hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy stock from AVON & NATASHA.

loans.name: Yom

texts.en:
Yom is a 33-year-old married woman with two children, both of whom are in school. She has had a business of selling charcoal in Bor, South Sudan for three years.

Yom is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase charcoal. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal for sale.

loans.name: Dora Piedad

texts.es:
Dora es una persona que ha sufrido muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo, la buena actitud que mantiene y las ganas de salir adelante le han permitido superar estas adversidades. Dora es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de 3 hijos, puesto que el padre de sus hijos murió hace un tiempo. Desde entonces, Dora ha sido la persona encargada de generar los ingresos para su hogar, sin embargo, las pocas posibilidades de empleo han hecho que no sea nada fácil. Dora al ver que no pudo conseguir un empleo, decidió montar un negocio de comidas que hasta el momento le ha dado buenos resultados, pues a pesar de que la competencia es muy grande, la buena calidad de sus productos han hecho que los clientes la prefieran por encima de los otros negocios.

Dora vende su mercancía principalmente a vecinos del sector y familiares, por lo que quiere aumentar sus clientes para aumentar sus ingresos. Dora quiere montar un puesto de comidas en la calle para lo que necesita algunas mesas y sillas y poder adecuar un buen sitio para sus clientes, sin embargo, en la actualidad no cuenta con el dinero suficiente para realizar estas compras por lo que tiene la esperanza puesta en que un préstamo le brindará la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de mesas y sillas para adecuar un puesto de comidas rápidas fuera de su casa.

Dora espera que de esta manera sus ingresos aumenten considerablemente, pues podrá atraer más clientes a su negocio ya que estará visible para todos. 
Dora quiere que sus hijos puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida, y tiene el gran sueño de poderse comprar algún día su casa propia, donde sus hijos puedan tener una estabilidad.
texts.en:
Dora is a person who has suffered many adversities in life.  However, her good attitude and the desire to get ahead have allowed her to overcome them.  Dora is a single mother head of household with three children because the father of her children died some time ago.  Since then, Dora has been the person in charge of generating income for her home.  However, the few employment opportunities have not made this very easy.  Seeing that finding employment was impossible, Dora decided to open a food business which to date has had good results because despite heavy competition the quality of her products have caused customers to prefer her over the other businesses.

Dora sells her merchandise primarily to neighbors in the sector and to family members but she wants to increase her clientele in order to increase her income.  Dora wants to set up a food stand in the street but needs some tables and chairs to furnish a good site for her customers.  However, she currently does not have enough money to make these purchases so is hoping for a loan that will allow her to buy tables and chairs to furnish a fast food stand outside her house.  Dora hopes that her income will increase considerably this way because she’ll be able to attract more customers to her business because it will be visible to everyone.

Dora wants her children to have a better quality of life and her great dream is to someday be able to buy a house of her own where her children can have stability.

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs.

loans.name: Tessie

texts.en:
Tessie is 47 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has three children.

Tessie has a shop that sells fruits, vegetables, spices, and food seasonings. She has had this business for eight years. She requested a loan of PHP 11,000 to buy fruits and vegetables for resale.

Tessie has been a member of HSPFI since 2010. In the future, she hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Fe

texts.en:
Fe  is 34 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with four children. 

Fe  has a shop that sells fish like trout, sardines & mackerel. She has had this business for 9 years. She requested a loan for 8,000 PHP to buy fish to sell.

Fe  has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Fe hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy fish to sell.

loans.name: Achol

texts.en:
Achol is a 41-year-old married woman with four children; two of them are in school. She has had a business selling charcoal in Bor, South Sudan for three years.

Achol is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase charcoal. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal for sale.

loans.name: Ega

texts.en:
Ega, 56, is a married woman with three children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

For the past ten years, she has operated a retail shop business, selling to her neighbours and passersby. She also does farming, which leads to her other source of livelihood. She faces a major challenge of the high cost of purchasing products. She dreams of expanding her farming business.

With the KES 30,000, Ega wants to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, and rice for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, and rice for resale.

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en:
Juliet is 41 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with three children. 

Juliet has a beauty salon, or shop, that provides hair cutting, styling, and re-bonding. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan for PHP 6,000 to buy materials needed for the beauty parlor.

Juliet has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Juliet hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy materials needed for the beauty salon

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
Lucy is 29 years old and married with one child aged four years. She runs a grocery store to earn a living, and she has been in the business for eight years. She describes her business environment as favorable because there is limited competition. 

Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to save her income and hopes to expand her business in the future. She has applied for 30,000 Kenya Shillings to buy beans, maize and peas to sell.

loans.use: To buy  beans, maize and peas to sell.

loans.name: Achol

texts.en:
Achol is a 39-year-old married woman with three children; two of them are in school. She has had a business selling charcoal in Bor, South Sudan for three years.

Achol is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase charcoal. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal for sale.

loans.name: Juditha

texts.en:
Juditha is 34 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has four children. 

Juditha has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, and beverages. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan of PHP 7,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages.

Juditha has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, she hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, and beverages for resale.

loans.name: Akil

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 30 years old and married.

Akil has been the owner of a food market since 2009, selling soft drinks, juices, vegetables, cheese and other dairy products and household items. He has a deep understanding of local consumer needs; he has sufficient experience in this field. His market is situated in a crowded area so there are a good number of customers passing by.

He decided to apply for a loan of $2400 in order to make an outdoor ceiling, a sliding door, and to add more foodstuffs for his market. He is aiming to earn more profit to offer him the opportunity to provide a better life for his family as a whole.

loans.use: to make an outdoor ceiling, a sliding door, and to add more foodstuffs for his market.

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam, 53 years old, is married and has a daughter and a son ages twenty and twenty-five years. She is an intelligent and patient woman. For the last three years, she has been selling charcoal to frequent customers. Her business is located at a busy and strategic place. 

Mariam describes her business challenge to be inadequate funds for improving the charcoal retail store. She plans to use the loan of Kes 20,000 to buy more charcoal to boost her business. Mariam looks forward to diversifying her business in the future. Her hope and dream is to diversify her business by supplying charcoal regionally.

loans.use: to buy more charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Letty

texts.en:
Letty is 41 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with two children. 

Letty has a shop where she makes & sells home-made sausage or "longganisa" & frozen foods like "tocino" & chicken. She has had this business for 6 years. She requested a loan for 8,000 PHP to buy raw ingredients for making home-made sausage & frozen foods.

Letty has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future,Letty hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients for making home-made sausage & frozen foods

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is 68 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has one child. 

Erlinda has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, and beverages. She has had this business for ten years. She requested a loan of PHP 8,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages.

Erlinda has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, she hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, and beverages for resale.

loans.name: Jessica

texts.en:
Jessica is 40 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with nine children. 

Jessica has a shop that sells a variety of food, home, kitchen & beverage products. She has had this business for 6 years. She requested a loan for 8,000 PHP to buy foods, house- & kitchenware & beverages.

Jessica has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Jessica hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy foods, house- & kitchenware & beverages.

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
Marilou is 42 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has five children. 

Marilou has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, and beverages. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan of PHP 8,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages.

Marilou has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, she hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, and beverages for resale.

loans.name: Alba Nelly

texts.es:
Alba ha sido una persona que se ha caracterizado por ser muy carismática y por ser muy trabajadora. Desde hace un tiempo viene desempeñando la actividad de la venta de mercancía, actividad que aprendió gracias a que una hermana suya también la desempeña. Alba, con el ánimo de poder ayudarle a su esposo en la generación de ingresos para su hogar, decidió iniciar esta actividad y actualmente tiene una buena cantidad de clientes, los cuales prefieren sus productos por la buena atención que ofrece. Alba también ha querido ayudar a la comunidad, por lo que actualmente esta realizando un curso de atención a la primera infancia. 

Alba, gracias a que sus ventas han ido aumentando, tiene grandes pedidos de sus clientes, sin embargo, no cuenta con el capital suficiente para comprar la mercancía a sus proveedores. Es por esto que tiene la esperanza en que un préstamo le brindará la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de productos de uso personal como lociones, cremas, shampoo, maquillaje, entre otros para atender los pedidos que le han hecho sus clientes.

Alba sueña con que su negocio le siga brindando ingresos para poder ayudarle a su esposo en la generación de ingresos para el hogar, y poder así mejorarles la calidad de vida a sus 4 hijos. Además, Alba sueña con tener un gran almacén donde pueda contratar a muchas personas que requieran de unos ingresos para su hogar.
texts.en:
Alba is a person who characterizes herself as being very charismatic and a hard worker. For some time now, she has worked selling merchandise, something she learned from her sister who is also in this line of work. With the impetus of helping her husband with the household income, Alba, decided to start working and she actually has a good amount of customers who prefer her products because of the good customer attention she provides.  Alba also wants to help her community so she is taking a course on infant-toddler and pre-school care.

Thanks to her increasing sales, Alba has lots of orders from her customers. However, she doesn’t have enough capital to buy merchandise from her suppliers. This is why she has the hope that a loan will afford her the opportunity to buy personal care products like lotions, creams, shampoo and make-up, among other things, to fill her clients' orders.  

Alba dreams that her business will continue to provide income in order to help her husband with the household income, and that way, provide a better quality of life for her 4 children. Alba also dreams of having a big store where she could hire many people who are in need of household income.

loans.use: buy personal care products like lotions, creams, shampoo and make-up, among other things, to fill her clients' orders.

loans.name: Maria Margarita

texts.es:
Maria Margarita es una persona que se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajadora y siempre querer brindarles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos. Es por esto que desde hace un tiempo decidió colaborarle a su esposo con la generación de ingresos para su hogar. Maria Margarita se dedica a la confección de prendas de vestir a terceros, actividad que aprendió desde hace un tiempo gracias a un curso que tomó. Actualmente Maria Margarita tiene buenos pedidos de sus clientes, lo que hace que pueda colaborar en su hogar a que sus hijos puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida.

Maria Margarita tiene un gran pedido de un cliente, por lo que requiere comprar insumos para la confección de este pedido. Es por esto que Maria Margarita acude a un préstamo con el ánimo de que le permita comprar insumos para la confección como es telas e hilos, además de poder realizarle el mantenimiento a su máquina de coser.

Maria Margarita espera que con esto sus ventas sigan aumentando, y de esta manera pueda brindarles una mejor educación a sus hijos. Además, sueña con que en un futuro, sus hijos tengan la posibilidad de acceder a una educación universitaria.
texts.en:
Maria Margarita is the type of person who is very hardworking and always wishing to provide her children with a better standard of living. For this reason she and her husband decided to generate more income for their household. Maria Margarita makes clothing, something she learned some while ago during a course that she took. She is now getting some good orders from her customers so she is earning enough money for her children to have a better quality of life.

She has a big order from one customer so needs to buy supplies in order to complete the order. For this reason she is seeking a loan to buy fabric and thread, and as well to have her sewing machine serviced. She hopes that her sales will increase so she can provide her children with a good education. Another hope for the future is that her children will attend university.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread, and to have her sewing machine serviced

loans.name: Mchombo

texts.en:
Mchomba is a married man with two children, both of whom attend school. He owns a house that neither has electricity nor piped water. His greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

For the past ten years, he has operated a motorcycle transport business,  operating from home to the market whereby his potential customers are neighbours and town dwellers. He faces a major challenge of lack of enough customers during the rainy season. He dreams of establishing a retail shop business.

With the Kshs 30,000 he wants to establish a retail shop, purchasing bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, rice and cooking fat for resale. He decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost his business.

loans.use: To purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, rice and cooking fat for resale.

loans.name: Jose Isaias

texts.es:
Jose es una persona que es caracterizada por sus ganas de trabajar y de salir adelante. Jose desde hace aproximadamente 10 años montó su cafetería donde atiende a sus clientes todos los días. Jose inició este negocio debido a que no encontraba oportunidades laborales y debió buscarse sus ingresos como independiente. Con el ánimo de incrementar sus ventas, Jose quiere comprar unas nuevas vitrinas, pues las que tiene ya se encuentran muy viejas, además de comprar surtido para su cafetería. Sin embargo, Jose no cuenta con el capital suficiente para realizar estas compras, por lo que tiene la esperanza en que un préstamo le brindará la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de mercancía para su cafetería como es café, servilletas, entre otros, y la compra de una vitrina nueva donde exhibir sus productos.

Jose espera que de esta manera sus ingresos aumenten considerablemente, además, espera que con unos mayores ingresos pueda brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jose is the type of person who is willing to work hard and wants to get ahead. Approximately ten months ago he opened a cafe where he serves customers every day of the week. He started the business as he couldn’t find any work so he had to earn a living through his own efforts. 

Because he wishes to increase his income, Jose wants to buy new display cabinets as the current ones are very old. As well he wishes to buy stock for his cafe. However, he cannot afford to make these purchases so he is hoping for a loan so he can buy coffee, serviettes, and a new cabinet so he can display his products.

Jose hopes that as a result his earnings will increase considerably and that with this additional money he will be able to provide his family with a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy coffee, serviettes, and a new display cabinet

loans.name: Tor

texts.en:
Tor is a 22-year-old married woman with two children; both of them are in school. She has had a business selling food items in Bor, South Sudan for two years.

Tor is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase sugar. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase sugar for sale.

loans.name: Nassir

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 37 years old, married and has two children.

Nassir has been the owner of a store since 2007, selling and fixing electrical items. He has sufficient experience in this field and a good reputation. He is becoming well-known in the surrounding areas.

He is requesting a $2400 loan in order to renovate his store. He is aiming to earn more profit to offer him the opportunity to provide a better life for his family as a whole.

loans.use: to renovate his store.

loans.name: Nena

texts.en:
Nena is 41 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has three children.
 
Nena has a bakeshop that makes and sells pastries, cookies, and a variety of breads. She has had this business for fifteen years. She requested a loan of PHP 8,000 to buy raw ingredients needed for the bakeshop.

Nena has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, she hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients needed for the bakeshop.

loans.name: Elvisa

texts.en:
Elvisa is 43 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with three children. 

Elvisa has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, and beverages. She has had this business for three years. She requested a loan for PHP 6,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages.

Elvisa has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Elvisa hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, and beverages to sell

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 34 years old, single, and lives with five family members, one of whom works.

Ahmad has been an owner of a mini-market since 2009, selling dates, herbs, breads, and soft drinks and frozen beef, chicken, and fish. He has sufficient experience in this field and a good reputation. His market is situated in a crowded area, so there are a lot of customers passing by.

He is requesting a USD 1,500 loan in order to fix his market's wall, purchase a large fridge, and add more foodstuffs. He is aiming to gain more profits to offer him the opportunity to provide a better life for his family as a whole.

loans.use: to fix his market's wall, purchase a large fridge, and add more foodstuffs.

loans.name: Jaime Eduardo

texts.es:
El señor Jaime tiene 42 años de edad, es casado y tiene dos hijos. Es una persona que ha luchado por salir adelante con su familia. Durante un año aproximadamente trabajo en un aeropuerto de mecánico en los Estados Unidos luego se regreso para El Salvador y estudio un curso de mecánica automotriz en la capital del país y desde entonces trabaja en ese oficio.

Jaime viaja hasta la ciudad que esta a cuatro horas de su hogar, para comprar llantas, grasa, aceite, entre otros más para venderles a sus clientes. Él solicita un préstamo a Fundación Campo para comprar llaves de diferentes medidas, llantas y grasa, que le hacen falta en su negocio por que tiene dos meses de haber iniciado este su negocio en un local que esta alquilando y aún le hacen falta herramientas. Así Jaime brindara un mejor servicio a sus clientes y le ayudara a recibir mejores ingresos para continuar trabajando. Él desea brindarles el estudio a sus hijos para que sean unos profesionales.
texts.en:
42-year old Sr. Jaime is married and has two children. He has struggled greatly to help his family get ahead. For approximately one year he worked as an airplane mechanic in the United States, but then returned to El Salvador where to took an automotive mechanic course in the capital city. Ever since that time he has been working as an automotive mechanic. 

Jaime travels to the city which is four hours away from his home to buy tires, grease, oil etc. to sell to his customers. He is seeking a loan from the Campo Foundation to buy different sizes of car keys, tires, and grease as his business lacks these items. He started the business two months ago in rented premises and he still lacks some tools. With the new purchases he will be able to provide better service to his customers and earn more money so he can continue with the business. Jaime wishes to provide his children with a good education so that they can get good jobs.

loans.use: to buy car keys, tires, and grease

loans.name: Paul

texts.en: Paul is 23 years old and married with two children. He sells shoes to earn a living. He has been in the business for eight years and has employed two people. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to save his income and hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for 20,000 Kenya Shillings to buy shoes for sale.

loans.use: To buy shoes for sale

loans.name: Akuol

texts.en:
Akuol is a 31-year-old married woman with two children; both of them are in school. She has had a business selling charcoal in Bor, South Sudan for three years.

Akuol is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase charcoal. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal for sale.

loans.name: Fe

texts.en:
Fe  is 61 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is widowed with two children. 

Fe  has a retail shop where she buys & sells canned goods, snacks & beverages. She has had this business for  5 years. She requested a loan of 6,000 PHP to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks & beverages.

Fe  has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Fe  hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages to sell.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen is a married man with two children, both of whom attend school. He lives at a rental house that neither has electricity nor piped water. His greatest monthly expenses are rent bills and school fees.

For the past four years, he has operated a carpentry business, selling to his neighbours. Stephen faces a major challenge of high cost of purchasing timber. He dreams of expanding his business in the future.

With the Kshs 40,000 he wants to purchase timber and cutting tools for his business. He decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost his business.

loans.use: To purchase timber and cutting tools for his business.

loans.name: Merlina

texts.en:
Merlina is 54 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with five children. 

Merlina has a shop that sells beauty and cosmetic products from Natasha, Avon, and Fuller Life. She has had this business for four years. She requested a loan for PHP 8,000 to buy beauty and cosmetic products from Natasha, Avon, and Fuller Life to sell.

Merlina has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Merlina hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy beauty and cosmetic products from NATASHA, AVON & FULLERLIFE for sell

loans.name: Monica

texts.en:
Monica, 31 years old, is a single young woman. She describes herself as a patient and persistent woman. For the last two years, she has been selling fruits such as mangoes and pineapples to pedestrians. Her business is in a productive and strategic place. She describes her business challenge to be the high price of fruits sold. She will be using the loan of KES 20,000 to buy more fruits such as mangoes, pineapples, etc. 

Monica's hope and dream is to venture into a supermarket business in the future. Her hope and dream is to use the proceeds she gets from the business to cater for her future family daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy more fruits for selling, such as mangoes, pineapples, etc.

loans.name: Emily

texts.en:
Emily is 40 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with four children. 

Emily has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, and beverages. She has had this business for six years. She requested a loan for PHP 8,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages.

Emily has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Emily hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, and beverages to sell

loans.name: Mahmoud

texts.en:
Mahmoud is a 31-year-old young man. He is a father with four sons and one daughter.

For the past four years, he has had a store for selling fruits and vegetables, which is a profitable project and the only source of income to the family. Mahmoud has a lack in some types of fruits and vegetables that customers usually request, so he is requesting a USD 1,500 loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing a collection of fruits and vegetables to resell. This will increase sales and improve the family's income.

Mahmoud is photographed in his store.

loans.use: To purchase a collection of fruits and vegetables to resell

loans.name: Halima

texts.en:
Halima is a 39-year-old married woman with two children who are enrolled in school. Her husband who is employed also contributes to the provision of the family's basic needs. She lives in a rental house with neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for her family.

Halima has operated a cereal-selling business for the past six years; she sells partly from her shop and partly door-to-door to her neighbors and friends. She faces a major challenge of seasonality. She aspires to own a well-stocked retail shop.

With the KES 20,000 she wants to purchase more stocks of cereals like maize, beans, sorghum, and millet for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access funds to boost her business.

loans.use: To purchase more stocks of cereals like maize, beans, sorghum, and millet for resale.

loans.name: Ana Reyna

texts.es:
Ana Reyna, de 63 años de edad, habitante de la ciudad de Granada. Nos comenta que su primer préstamo Kiva, que le permitió a su negocio crecer ella había solicitado el préstamo para comprar materia prima como tela ,encajes, hilos para elaborar vestidos para niñas  fue tanta la demanda que tuvo que dejar pedidos pendientes pues le demandaron mas vestidos ya que todos los que hizo se vendieron por completo eso fue muy buenos para ella, sus creaciones se han dado a conocer poco a poco.

Ahora ella solicita este crédito para compra de mas materia prima como telas, encajes, hilos , botones. para elaborar trajes para niñas. Ella siempre esta con la meta de comprar 2 maquinas nuevas de coser.
texts.en: Reyna, 63, lives in the city of Granada.  She comments that her first Kiva loan allowed her business to grow.  She’d asked for the loan to buy raw materials like fabric, lace and thread to make dresses for girls.  She had so much demand that she had to leave some orders pending because she got more orders for dresses and all the ones she had made sold out; this was very good for her, her creations have gradually become known.  Now, she’s asking for this loan to buy raw materials like fabric, lace, thread and buttons to make girls’ dresses.  Her goal is to buy two new sewing machines.

loans.use: to buy lace, thread and buttons.

loans.name: Nyibol

texts.en:
Nyibol is a 32-year-old married woman with three children; all of them are in school. She has had a business of selling food in a stall in Bor, South Sudan, for two years.

Nyibol is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase beans and maize. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay her children's school fee.

loans.use: to purchase beans and maize to sell.

loans.name: Blanca Nelly

texts.es:
Blanca es una persona que ha atravesado por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo, ha tenido mucha fortaleza que le ha permitido salir adelante. Blanca abandonó su municipio natal en búsqueda de mejores alternativas de vida, y poco a poco ha ido mejorando su calidad de vida. Con 53 años de edad, Blanca es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de 4 hijos a los que les debe brindar lo que necesitan, pues el padre de sus hijos no le colabora económicamente para el sostenimiento de sus gastos. Blanca, hace poco montó una tienda general en una nueva casa donde está viviendo, y gracias a esta ha podido generar los ingresos para su hogar.

Blanca debe realizarle algunas adecuaciones locativas a su tienda, además de surtirla con una mayor variedad de mercancía, para así atraer a más clientes. Sin embargo, no cuenta con el capital suficiente para realizar estas compras y adecuaciones, por lo que tiene la esperanza en que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de mercancía para su tienda general como productos de la canasta familiar y a realizarle adecuaciones locativas a su tienda.

Blanca sueña con que su tienda pueda tener muchos clientes y pueda generar mejores ingresos para su familia, además sueña con que sus hijos tengan una buena educación y puedan tener una estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Blanca is a person who has faced much adversity in her life, but despite that, she’s had the strength to get ahead. Blanca left her place of birth in search of a better way to live, and little by little she’s been improving her quality of life. With 53 years of age, Blanca is a single mother of 4 children and the head of the family who must provide her children with their basic needs, because their father doesn’t help her financially with the costs of maintenance. A short time ago, Blanca started a general store in the new house where she lives, and thanks to this, she’s been able to generate income for her household.   

Blanca has to make some renovations to her store, as well as, stock it with a bigger variety of products so that she can attract more customers. However, she doesn’t have enough capital to make these purchases or renovations. She hopes that a loan will allow her the possibility to buy the products she needs for her general store, like every day groceries, and to carry out the renovations to her store.

Blanca dreams that her store attracts many customers and that it generates more income for her family. She also dreams that her children will have a good education and financial stability.

loans.use: buy the products she needs for her general store, like every day groceries, and to carry out renovations to her store.

loans.name: Imad

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 47 years old, married and has four children.

Imad has been an owner of a men’s clothing and accessories store since1998. He has sufficient experience in this field, a good reputation, and a deep understanding of local consumer needs. He is well-known in the surrounding areas.

He is requesting a $1500 loan. He is aiming to gain more profits to offer him the opportunity to provide a better life for his family as a whole.

loans.use: to pay the annual rent for his store.

loans.name: José Plinio

texts.es:
Don José tiene 52 años de edad, esta casado y tiene 6 hijos de los cuales solo 3 viven con él. Trabaja como promotor de salud desde hace 19 años, también trabaja realizando actividades agrícolas, fue su papá quien le enseño y siempre se ha dedicado al desarrollo de estas actividades.

Los insumos e implementos agrícolas los compra en una ciudad que se encuentra a unos veintinueve minutos de su casa y tiene que caminar unos cinco minutos a pie, él tiene que cruzarse una quebrada y subir una cuesta hasta llegar al lugar donde aborda el autobús.

Don José solicita el préstamo para cancelar el alquiler del terreno donde realizara sus cultivos y para comprar cinco sacos de sulfato, tres sacos de formula y herbicidas. De esta manera él estará seguro con el lugar donde cultivara y va a estar listo con los insumos para cuando sea  la época de sembrar. José espera continuar trabajando para asegurar el sustento diario de su familia.
texts.en:
Don Jose, 52, is married and has 6 children, 3 of whom still live at home.  He has worked as a "promotor de salud" [healthcare work, but role isn't clear] for 19 years.  He has a farm as well.  He learned farming from his father and has been working on farms since he was a boy.  

Jose buys the supplies that he needs for the farm in a city twenty-nine minutes from his house.  He goes on foot, through a stream and over a hill, to reach the nearest bus stop five minutes away.  

Don Jose is applying for a loan that he will use to pay for the land he rents for his farm and buy the supplies--sacks of sulphates, formula and herbicides--he needs for his next crop.  He wants to stock the supplies so that he'll have everything now that he'll need then.  He wants to go on working so that he can continue to support his family.

loans.use: to pay for rented land and buy supplies for his farming business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a lot and build a house.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en: Jane, 43 years old, is married and has three children ranging from thirteen to twenty years. She describes herself as a God-fearing and bold woman. For the last ten years, Jane has been running a butcher shop and sells meat to business persons. Her business is located at a busy and viable place. She describes her business challenge to be stiff competition within the area and inadequate funds to improve the butcher shop. She will be using the loan of Kes 20,000 to buy more meat to sell. In the next five years, Jane's plan and hope is to venture into running a big supermarket.

loans.use: to buy more meat to sell.

loans.name: Joel

texts.en:
Joel is 27 years old and is married with one child who is two years old. He sells potatoes and the hours of his business are from 7 am to 6 pm all week except on Sunday. He currently employs one person to help him and he has ten years of experience in this business. 

Joel has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase a large quantity of potatoes for resale. With any profits from the loan, he would like to satisfy his family' basic needs and to reinvest in his business.

loans.use: To purchase a large quantity of potatoes for resale.

loans.name: Claudia Milena

texts.es:
Claudia Milena siempre ha tenido un gran talento para realizar accesorios a mano, y con esto ha podido generar ingresos para su hogar. Desde hace un tiempo aprendió a realizar accesorios con diferentes materiales, y desde entonces, con el ánimo de colaborar con los ingresos para su hogar, ha venido elaborando accesorios en su tiempo libre y vendiéndolo a sus clientes. Claudia Milena se encuentra casada y es madre de 2 hijos, a los que siempre busca brindarles una mejor calidad de vida.

Claudia Milena tiene actualmente un pedido por parte de uno de sus clientes, por lo que debe comprar materia prima para elaborar los accesorios. Sin embargo, Claudia Milena no cuenta con el capital suficiente para realizar la compra de todas las materias primas que requiere, por lo que aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de materias primas como piedras, pegante, entre otros para elaborar pedido de un cliente.

Claudia Milena espera que sus ventas sigan incrementándose de modo que pueda generar mayores ingresos para su hogar. Claudia Milena sueña con que sus hijos puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida y puedan acceder a una educación de calidad.
texts.en:
Claudia Milena has always had a talent for making accessories, a talent that she's turned to earning an extra income for her family.  She started making accessories years before starting her business, using whatever was at hand, and later, when she was looking for a way to contribute to the family income, selling what she made to her customers.  Claudia Milena is married and has 2 children, children she works hard to provide for.  

Claudia Milena needs supplies to fill an order that she's received from one of her customers.  However, she doesn't have enough money to buy the supplies--stones, glue, etc.--she needs so she's applying for this loan.  

Claudia Milena hopes that her sales will continue to increase so that she can earn more to help her family.  She wants her children to have a better quality of life and get the best possible education.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her crafts business.

loans.name: Tumaini

texts.en:
Tumaini is a 33-year-old married woman with three children who are enrolled in school. She lives in a rental house with neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for her family.

Tumaini has operated a charcoal selling business for the past one year; she sells her products from home to her neighbors and the local area villagers. She faces a major challenge of transportation. She aspires to expand her business.

With the Kshs 20,000 she wants to purchase 15 sacks of charcoal for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access funds to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase 15 sacks of charcoal for resale.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is a 38-year-old married woman with three children, and all of them are in school. She has had a business selling charcoal in Bor, South Sudan for two years.
 
Elizabeth is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase charcoal. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal for sale.

loans.name: Ashraf

texts.en:
Ashraf is a 36-year-old man. He is a father with three sons and two daughters; some of them are school students. Ashraf works as a driver in the Palestinian Ministry of Civil Affairs and gets a low salary, which is not enough to cover the family's living expenses and education costs. For the past one year, Ashraf has also been raising and selling sheep and sheep products, which has been a profitable project.

Ashraf is requesting a 3,000 USD loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing more sheep and fodder and expanding and improving the herd's condition. This will increase sales and improve the family's income positively. Ashraf is photographed in the picture.

loans.use: To purchase more sheep and fodder and improve the herd's condition.

loans.name: Rhodah

texts.en: Rhodah is a married woman. She has no children yet. She describes herself as a humble and determined woman. For the last three years, Rhodah has been in the business of selling tea leaves to local residents. Her business involves moving from one place to the other. She describes her business challenge to be the high cost of tea leaves. Rhodah will be using the  Kes 10,000 loan to buy more tea leaves for sale. Rhodah's hope and dream is to be a big supplier of tea leaves in the next five years.

loans.use: to buy more tea leaves for sale .

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James is 45 years old and married with five children. He does television and computer repair to earn a living. He has been in the business for 13 years. He does farming to earn extra income. 

Since he joined Faulu Kenya, James has been able to save his income and hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for 30,000 Kenya Shillings to buy television spare parts and a video recorder.

loans.use: To buy television spare parts and a video recorder.

loans.name: Kuany

texts.en:
Kuany is a 30-year-old married woman with four children. All of them have been in school. She has had a business selling fish in Bor, South Sudan for three years.

Kuany is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase fish. She will use her extra income from this loan to build a house in future.

loans.use: to purchase fish for sale.

loans.name: Akuch

texts.en:
Akuch is a 39-year-old married woman with three children,; two of them are in school. She has had a business selling charcoal in Bor, South Sudan for three years.

Akuch is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase charcoal. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal for sale.

loans.name: Michael

texts.en:
Michael is 34 years old and married with two children. He does transport business to earn a living. He has been in the business for seven years and has employed four people. 

Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to improve his living standards and hopes to expand his business in the future. He has applied for 80,000 Kenya Shillings to buy new tires for his car.

loans.use: To buy new tires for his car.

loans.name: Anyieth

texts.en:
Anyieth is a 30 year old a married woman with three children, all of whom are in school. She has had a business of selling in a  food stall in Langber Bor, South Sudan for two years.
Anyieth is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase sugar and oil for resale. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase sugar and oil for sale.

loans.name: Amuor

texts.en:
Amuor is a 39 year old a married woman with six children, two of whom are in school. She has had a business of selling fish in Langber Bor, South Sudan for two years.
Amuor is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase fish for sale. She will use the extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase fish for sale.

loans.name: Pauline

texts.en:
Pauline is applying for another loan to start a new business selling clothes. She will use this 100,000 Kes loan to purchase bundles of clothes for resale. In the future, Pauline aspires to continue improving her business. 

Since taking her last Kiva loan, Pauline has greatly improved her family’s standard of living. She hopes to continue accessing the financial services offered by Yehu and Kiva lenders and thanks you for your support!

loans.use: To purchase bundles of clothes for resale.

loans.name: Adau

texts.en:
Adau is a 32 year old married woman with four children, two of them are in school. She has had a business selling charcoal in Bor South Sudan for 3 years.
Adau is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase charcoal. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees for her children.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal for sale.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 42 year old man. He is a father with two sons and one daughter. Mohammad works in agriculture, but with low income which is not enough to cover the family's costs. For the past 3 years, Mohammad has also been leasing chairs and tables that are requested by customers to be used in their consolation and wedding occasions, which has been a profitable project.

Mohammad is requesting a loan of 2,000 USD from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing more chairs and tables. This will increase his work load and improve the family's income. 

Mohammad is photographed in the picture.

loans.use: To purchase additional numbers of tables and chairs for leasing.

loans.name: Nubia Rosa

texts.es:
Nubia se ha caracterizado por ser una persona muy trabajadora y siempre querer brindarles la mejor calidad de vida a su esposo y sus 2 hijos. Debido a las pocas oportunidades de empleo que encontraba su esposo, y los bajos ingresos que este podía aportar al hogar, Nubia decidió montar su negocio de comidas rápidas a las afueras de una universidad de la ciudad. Desde entonces, Nubia ha aportado a los ingresos de su hogar colaborándole a su esposo con los gastos que se generan. 

Nubia cuenta con muy buenos clientes, lo que ha hecho que sus ingresos aumenten considerablemente. Sin embargo, el invierno ha hecho que sus ventas disminuyan debido a que no tiene una carpa con qué taparse, sino tan solo un plástico que implementó de manera recursiva que solo la tapa un poco de las lluvias. Con el ánimo de revertir esta situación, Nubia quiere comprar una carpa para taparse, por lo que acude a un préstamo con la esperanza de que este le pueda brindar la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de una carpa para taparse de la lluvia y la compra de insumos para la preparación de sus comidas.

Nubia espera que de esta manera sus ingresos aumenten considerablemente, pues en épocas de lluvias sus ventas no se verán tan afectadas.
Nubia sueña con que en un futuro su negocio le permita brindarles a sus hijos una educación de calidad y el acceso a una educación universitaria, además, de poder mejorar la calidad de vida de su esposo, sus hijos y ella.
texts.en:
Nubia is a very hard-working person and always wants to provide the best quality of life to her husband and two children.  Due to the limited employment opportunities available to her husband, and the little income he was bringing home for this reason, Nubia decided to set up a fast food business outside of one of the city's universities.  Since then, Nubia has contributed to the household income, collaborating with her husband on expenses incurred.

Nubia has many good clients, which has caused her income to increase considerably.  Nonetheless, the winter has brought down sales because she doesn't have a tent for cover, only a plastic sheet that keeps out a little of the rain.  In an effort to reverse this situation, Nubia is turning to a loan in the hope that it will provide an opportunity to purchase a tent for protection from rain as well as to buy supplies for preparation of meals. Nubia hopes that this will result in a considerable increase in income, since sales won't be so affected by the rainy season.

Nubia dreams that her business will allow her to offer her children a quality education and access to a university education as well as improve quality of life for her husband, her children and herself.

loans.use: to buy a tent for protection from the rain and to purchase supplies for meal preparation.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a 40 year old a married woman with three children, two of whom are in school. She has had a business selling food at a stall in Bor, South Sudan for two years.

Mary is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase beans and sugar. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees for her children.

loans.use: to purchase beans and sugar for sale.

loans.name: Ana Cruz

texts.es:
La señora Ana tiene 45 años de edad, es viuda con cuatro hijos. Desde hace 15 años se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tortillas y este oficio lo aprendió de su familia ya que se dedican a lo mismo. Ella les compra a sus hermanos el maíz y la leña que son sus principales insumos.

La señora Ana solicita el préstamo a Fundación Campo, para arreglar las escrituras de su propiedad, ya que no le aparecen registradas y ella quiere asegurar la vivienda para su futuro. Legalizando su propiedad no tendrá problemas de que se la pueden quitar y sus hijos tendrán un hogar seguro para que no anden de un lugar a otro. Ella desea generar más ingresos para construir una casa nueva.
texts.en:
Ana is 45 years old, and a widow with four children. For 15 years she has been making and selling tortillas.  She learned this trade from her family and continues working in it. She buys her brothers corn and firewood, which are the main inputs.

Ana is asking for a loan from Fundación Campo to arrange the deed to her property because it is not registered and she wants to secure housing for their future. By legalizing her property, she will not have the problem of being evicted and her children will have a safe home so that they won't have to move from one place to another. Ana wants to generate more revenue to build a new house.

loans.use: to arrange the deed to her property.

loans.name: Nataly

texts.es:
Nataly es muy dedicada a su familia, y esto es lo que ha hecho que salga adelante trabajando fuertemente. Con 26 años de edad, Nataly se encuentra casada y es madre de una hija de 1 año de edad. Su esposo trabaja como empleado en una empresa, pero su remuneración es muy baja; es por esto que Nataly decidió empezar a vender mercancía de uso doméstico y de uso personal para poder generar más ingresos para su hogar y poder tener con qué sostener los gastos que se generan. Nataly tiene el inconveniente de que vende su mercancía mostrándosela a diferentes clientes, por lo que tiene que moverse de su residencia constantemente, y tiene que dejar con alguna persona que le cuide a su hija de 1 año.

Nataly quiere cambiar esta situación y para esto quiere ofrecer sus productos desde su vivienda, es por esto que acude a un préstamo con el ánimo de que le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de una vitrina para exhibir sus productos de uso doméstico y de uso personal desde su casa y no tener así que moverse constantemente y dejar a su hija al cuidado de otra persona. 

Nataly espera que de esta manera pueda estar al cuidado de su hija durante todo el tiempo sin que se vean afectadas sus ventas. De esta manera, le podrá aumentar la calidad de vida a su hija y podrá ofrecerle un mejor cuidado en su crecimiento.
texts.en:
Nataly is very dedicated to her family, and this is what has made her move forward through hard work. At 26 years old, Nataly finds herself married, and she is the mother of a one-year-old daughter. Her husband works as an employee in a business, but his pay is very low; this is why Nataly decided to start selling merchandise for household and personal use in order to generate more income for her home and to be able to have enough to cover their expenses. Nataly has the inconvenience of selling her merchandise by showing it to different customers, for which she has to leave her home constantly, and she has to leave her one-year-old daughter in the care of someone else.

Nataly wants to change this situation, and to do this she wants to offer her products from her home. This is why she is taking out a loan, with the thought that it brings her the opportunity to buy a display case to exhibit her merchandise for household and personal use from her home, so she will not have to be on the move constantly and leave her daughter in the care of another person. 

Nataly hopes that in this way she can take care of her daughter all the time without affecting her sales. In this way, she will be able to increase her daughter's quality of life, and she will be able to take better care of her as she grows.

loans.use: to purchase a display case to exhibit her merchandise for household and personal use from her home, so she will not have to be on the move constantly and leave her daughter in the care of someone else

loans.name: Alejandro

texts.es: Alejandro de 54 años de edad, está casado con Alejandra de 50 años, fruto de este amor tienen 7 hijos. Juntos viven en su casa propia, ubicado en la comunidad de Periavente alta del distrito de Llochegua. Alejandro, es un buen trabajador,se dedica a la agricultura, cultivando cacao y café sobre sus propias parcelas. Asmimsimo nos manifiesta que la necesidad económica lo impulso a trabajar en éste rubro. Generalmente trabaja con el apoyo de su querida esposa, pero en épocas de cosecha siempre cuenta con jornaleros quienes le facilitan en la extracción de sus productos y del que luego son enviados al secadero(lugar donde secan los granos) y finalmente son vendidos. Alejandro está contento con lo que realiza pues gracias a ello, paga la educación y alimentación de sus hijos. Más adelante esta pensando abrir una tienda de abarrotes con la finalidad de obtener otros ingresos. Este será su segundo crédito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles contratará peones para limpiar y fertilizar sus plantaciones de cacao y café.
texts.en:
Alejandro, 54, is married to Alejandra, 50 and they have seven children.  They live together in their own house located in the community of Periavente Alta in Llochegua District.  Alejandro is a good worker; he’s a farmer growing cocoa beans and coffee on his own parcels.  He also told us that economic need pushed him into this hard line of work.  

His beloved wife usually helps him do the work but during harvest time he always hires day laborers that facilitate picking the products which are then sent to a drying area where the beans are dried and finally sold.  Alejandro is happy with what he does because thanks to it he pays for his children’s food and education.  Later on he plans to open a grocery store to earn additional income.  This will be his second MFP loan and he’s committed to make his installment payments punctually.  He will use the 3000 new soles to hire day laborers to clear and fertilize his cocoa bean and coffee crops.

loans.use: to hire day laborers.

loans.name: María Del Transito

texts.es:
Maria tiene 25 años de edad, vive con su compañero de vida y dos hijos. Desde hace siete años se trabaja como empleada vendiendo productos comestibles en un chalet en una escuela. Eso hace que ella tenga mucha experiencia en este negocio y en los gustos de los niños, se levanta a las 4:30 a.m. para ir a preparar las cosas que va a vender.

El préstamo que esta solicitando es para comprar el chalet, ya que la persona para la cual trabaja se lo vende y ella quiere adquirirlo. Eso le permitirá obtener mayores ingresos para su familia mejorando su calidad de vida  y también que le permita realizarle mejoras a su vivienda y seguir enviando a sus hijos a la escuela.
texts.en:
Maria is 25 years old. She lives with her partner and two children. For seven years, she has worked as an employee selling food products in a stall in a school. Because of this, she has a lot of experience in this business and with children's tastes. She wakes up at 4:30 a.m. in order to go prepare the things she is going to sell.

The loan she is asking for is to buy the stall, since the person for whom she works is selling it, and she would like to buy it. This will allow her to earn more income for her family, improving their quality of life. It will also allow her to make improvements to her house and continue sending her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase a food stall

loans.name: Adriana Berenice

texts.es: La señora Adriana,   se entero  del  apoyo  brindado  a  las   familias para  la  realización de   sus  diferentes  proyectos gracias  a  una clienta  distinguida  de la institución, el  proyecto   que  desea  realizar   es  la  construcción de  una  losa de concreto  para  su  vivienda   ya  que  nos  comenta   que  en  temporadas  de lluvia entra  el  agua a  su   vivienda  debido a  que  actualmente   cuenta  con un  techo de  madera el cual  ya  esta  muy  deteriorado,  ve  en  el crédito  la posibilidad  de  ofrecer a  sus   pequeños  hijos   mejores  condiciones  de  vida, es  por  ello  que  esta   muy  agradecida por  el  apoyo  brindado  para  hacer   su sueño una realidad.
texts.en: La señora Adriana,   se entero  del  apoyo  brindado  a  las   familias para  la  realización de   sus  diferentes  proyectos gracias  a  una clienta  distinguida  de la institución, el  proyecto   que  desea  realizar   es  la  construcción de  una  losa de concreto  para  su  vivienda   ya  que  nos  comenta   que  en  temporadas  de lluvia entra  el  agua a  su   vivienda  debido a  que  actualmente   cuenta  con un  techo de  madera el cual  ya  esta  muy  deteriorado,  ve  en  el crédito  la posibilidad  de  ofrecer a  sus   pequeños  hijos   mejores  condiciones  de  vida, es  por  ello  que  esta   muy  agradecida por  el  apoyo  brindado  para  hacer   su sueño una realidad.

loans.use: to install concrete roofing shingles..

loans.name: Aydee

texts.es:
Aydee de 19 años convive con Wilder de 25 años, fruto de este gran amor tienen 1 hijo. Juntos habitan en su casa propia ubicado en el distrito Llochegua. Aydee es una madre dedicada a las labores de casa y a la agricultura, pues desde muy pequeña aprendió esta labor, y ahroa cultiva en grandes extensiones café y cacao.
Los trabajos lo realiza juntamente con su amado esposo coordinadamente, pero en temporadas de cosecha  o de deshierbo de maleza requiere de peones que les pueda facilitar el trabajo.
El fruto de sus cultivos los expende en el distrito de Llochegua a un precio muy cómodo, el único inconveniente que ella tiene es la de no contar con un secadero (lugar o espacio donde secan los granos), porque su campo agrícola se encuentra en una ladera. En un futuro Aydee desea comprar un terreno agrícola en el valle del distrito de Llochegua. Este será su segundo crédito con MFP, por lo que se compromete una vez mas en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 3,000  nuevos soles realizará la compra de un terreno agrícola.
texts.en:
Aydee, 19, lives with Wilder, 25, and their son.  They live together in their own house located in Llochegua District.  Aydee is a mother who is dedicated to household chores and farming because she learned this work since she was little and now farms large extensions of coffee and cocoa beans.  She does the work in a coordinated manner together with her beloved husband but during harvest and weeding season she needs day laborers to help her do the work more easily.

She sells her products in Llochegua District at a very good price.  The only inconvenience she faces is not having a “secadero” (place or space where the grains are dried) because her parcel of land is on a hillside.  In the future, Aydee wants to buy a parcel of farmland in Llochegua District.  This will be her second MFP loan so she once again commits to make her installment payments punctually.  She will use the 3000 new soles to buy a parcel of farm land.

loans.use: to buy a parcel of farm land.

loans.name: Estefana

texts.es: La señora  Estefana es una persona trabajadora  y  muy responsable  la cual  tiene  una  tienda  de abarrotes  la  cual  le  permite   salir  adelante   día  con  día,  ella  se acerco  con nosotros  ya   que   requiere  realizar  la compra  de mercancía  para   su  negocio  ya que  nos comenta  que   su numero de clientes  a  incrementado  satisfactoriamente ,  agradece  el  apoyo  brindado para  la  realización de  su  proyecto  ya  que  podrá  seguir   brindándoles  a  sus clientes  el excelente  servicio  que  a  lo largo  de los  años   la  a  caracterizado.
texts.en: Estefana is a hardworking, very responsible person who has a grocery store that allows her to get ahead day by day.  She approached us because she wants to buy merchandise for her store because she comments that the number of customers has increased satisfactorily.  She is grateful for the support provided toward reaching her goal because she’ll be able to provide the excellent service to her customers that has characterized her all these years.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her grocery store.

loans.name: Maria De  Los Angeles

texts.es: La señora María es una persona responsable y  muy trabajadora  la  cual  actualmente  tiene  un   negocio  de  venta de ropa  nueva, ella nos   comenta   que   inicialmente   tenia  el  negocio  en su casa  pero  debido a la  gran  demanda  de  sus  clientes  le permitió   rentar   un local  comercial  , esta muy  contenta  de   habernos  encontrado  ya   que   gracias a  nuestra  ayuda  podrá  realizar  su proyecto,  el  cual  consiste  en realizar  la  compra  de mercancía  para   poder  seguir  brindando a  sus  clientes  el  excelente  servicio  que  la  a caracterizado.
texts.en: María’s a responsible, hardworking person who currently has a business selling new clothes.  She comments that initially she had the business at home but due to the great customer demand she was able to rent a commercial space.  She is very happy to have found us because thanks to our help she will be able to carry out her project which consists in buying merchandise to continue providing her customers with the excellent service which is characteristic of her.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a display case that will give her the opportunity to better exhibit her merchandise to her customers

loans.name: Abdugafur

texts.ru: Абдугафур женат и ответственный отец двоих детей. Он очень трудолюбивый и добрый человек. Более 5 лет он занимается производством двуспальных кроватей и кухонных гарнитуров. Также он сам привозит мебель по  заказу на дом. Абдугафур хочет установить оборудование газа для автомашины. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Abdugafur is married and is a responsible father of two children. He is a very hardworking and kind man. He has been manufacturing double beds and kitchen furniture for more than five years. He also delivers the furniture to homes. Abdugafur wants to install a gas equipment on his vehicle. He is hoping for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to install natural gas equipment on the vehicle.

loans.name: Flor Arely

texts.es:
La señora Flor tiene 36 años de edad, es madre soltera de tres hijos. Ella tiene instalada una tienda en su casa desde hace cinco años y este negocio lo heredo de su mamá. Se levanta a las 4:00 a.m. para preparar a sus hijos para mandarlos a la escuela y vender pan en la mañana, los productos para su tienda los compra en una ciudad del oriente del país, por más comodidad y los demás productos se los llevan a dejar a su casa.

Ella solicita un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar sardinas, arroz, azúcar, frijoles, pollo, etc. Que son productos que aún no tiene en su tienda y con el préstamo la surtirá más. Al tener más productos venderá más y obtendrá más ingresos para que sus hijos continúen estudiando en la universidad, ya que eso es lo más importante para Flor.
texts.en:
Flor is 36 years old and is the single mother of three children. She has had a store in her house for five years. She inherited this business from her mother. She wakes up at 4:00 a.m. in order to get her children ready and send them to school and to sell bread in the morning. She buys the products for her store in a city in the eastern part of the country because it's more convenient, and other products are delivered to her house. 

She is asking for a loan from Fundación Campo to buy sardines, rice, sugar, beans, chicken, etc. These are the products that she still does not have in her store, and with the loan, she will stock it with more items. When she has more products, she will sell more and earn more, so that her children will continue studying at the university, since this is the most important thing for Flor.

loans.use: to purchase sardines, rice, sugar, beans, chicken, etc. to sell in her store

loans.name: Aurora De Jesus

texts.es:
Aurora es una persona que ha trabajado durante gran parte de su vida, pues no proviene de una familia con grandes recursos económicos. Aurora, con 58 años de edad se encuentra casada y es madre de un hijo de 22 años, al que sueña brindándole un acceso a la educación universitaria. Aurora se dedica desde hace aproximadamente 5 años a la producción de arepas, actividad con la cual contribuye a los ingresos para el hogar. Las arepas que fabrica Aurora son reconocidas por tener muy buena calidad, y gracias a esto tiene muy buenos pedidos por parte de sus clientes. Aurora ha tenido muy buenos pedidos, algunos tan grandes que no tiene la capacidad productiva para poderlo satisfacer, por esto espera aumentar su capacidad productiva. Aurora con el ánimo de fabricar un gran pedido de arepas que le ha hecho uno de sus clientes, busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de comprar insumos en especial maíz para la fabricación de sus arepas.

Aurora espera que con los ingresos que le ha estado generando su negocio pueda comprar un segundo horno, en el cual pueda producir más arepas y poder abastecer pedidos más grandes por parte de sus clientes. Aurora sueña con que su esposo, su hijo y ella puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida y una estabilidad económica. Además, Aurora quiere cumplirle el sueño a su hijo de poder acceder a una educación superior.
texts.en:
Aurora is a person who has worked most of her life because she comes from a family of few economic resources.  Aurora, 58, is married and the mother of a 22-year-old son who she dreams with providing a university education for.  Aurora has been making “arepas” [corn cakes] for about five years, an activity that allows her to contribute to household income.  The arepas Aurora makes are known for being of very good quality and thanks to this she has very good customer orders.  Aurora has had very good orders some of them so good, in fact, that she does not have the production capacity to fill them which is why she’s hoping for a loan to increase her productive capacity.  Aiming at making arepas to fill a very large customer order, she’s seeking a loan that will make it possible for her to buy the ingredients, especially corn, needed to make her arepas.

Aurora hopes that with the income her business is generating she’ll be able to buy a second oven to produce still more arepas and fill larger customer orders.  Aurora dreams that she, her husband and her son will have a better quality of life and economic stability.  In addition, Aurora wants to make her son’s dream of accessing higher education come true.

loans.use: to buy arepa making ingredients.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy beef and pork in larger quantities.

loans.name: Maria Eugenia

texts.es:
Maria Eugenia es una madre soltera cabeza de familia de 10 hijos, a los cuales su padre los abandonó hace un tiempo y no aporta ninguna ayuda económica para el sostenimiento de sus gastos. Maria Eugenia en vista de la necesidad de genera ingresos para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar, montó un taller de confección donde ofrece el servicio de la confección a terceros, y gracias al cual genera los ingresos para su hogar. Maria Eugenia tiene muy buenos pedidos por parte de sus clientes, sin embargo, existen temporadas de muy bajo trabajo donde Maria Eugenia recibe muy bajos ingresos.

Con el ánimo de generar mayores ingresos a través de la prestación de un servicio más en la confección, Maria Eugenia quiere comprar una máquina recubridora, sin embargo, no cuenta con el capital suficiente para la compra de este, por lo que tiene la esperanza en que un préstamo le brindará la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de una máquina recubridora que le permita ofrecer mayores servicios a sus clientes.
Maria Eugenia espera que de esta manera sus ingresos sigan aumentando, para poder mejorarles la calidad de vida a sus 10 hijos, además de poder ofrecerles una buena educación y una estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
María Eugenia is a single mother, head of household with ten children who were abandoned by their father some time ago; he contributes no economic support toward their expenses.  Needing to produce income to support her household, María Eugenia set up a sewing workshop where she assembles clothes for third parties and thanks to which she generates household income.  María Eugenia has very good customer orders.  However, there are seasons with very little work when María Eugenia receives very low income.
